sentences.en: I left the camera and tripod in the rain and jumped in my vehicle until I had calmed down.

sentences.en: It is very important that you do not move your computer or tripod during the whole process.

sentences.en: Level camera on tripod head. Set lens to f / 8.

sentences.en: Lower camera six inches, adjust tripod legs.
sentences.cn: 把相机向下拉六英寸, 调整三脚架的腿.

sentences.en: Make sure the tripod is stable.

sentences.en: Tripod steady. Run up the bank with sun coming fast behind him.

sentences.en: When he folded up his tripod at eight thirty five , he felt good.
